comments:
3.1 M7 on Win XP

I am trying to display or inspect a static variable on a class, something like

public class Foo {
  public static void method() {
    stuff.add("123");
    stuff.add("456");
  }
  private static java.util.Vector stuff = new java.util.Vector();
}

I have a breakpoint on one of the stuff.add lines.  When I attempt to display or
inspect stuff, I get the following in the log:
